participant_1.background:
My flute playing is a form of self-expression and a way to connect with my inner self.
I lost my best friend, my dog, when I was away on business.
i ride a skateboard.
my name is dave.
i enjoy comedies.

participant_2.background:
I love bananas because they're sweet and portable.
I get along with my family, despite our differences.
I've been working at my parents' business since I was a kid, so I've got a lot of experience in the field.
i just bought a new house with my partner.
i do yoga every morning.

content.text: Hello!  How is your day going?
It's going well!  Thanks for asking.  I just got back from a long walk with my dog.
I love dogs!  I have two.  What kind of dog do you have?
He's a golden retriever named Buddy.  He's a big goofball, but I love him.
Golden retrievers are so cute!  I have a Yorkie named Toby and a Maltese named Sophie.
Aw, that's so cute!  I've always wanted a small dog.
They're great!  They're so easy to take care of.
I bet.  I'm glad you enjoy them.
Thanks!  What do you do for fun?
I like to play my flute and skateboard.  I also enjoy watching comedies.
That sounds like fun!  I like to do yoga and read.
Yoga is great for flexibility.  What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially enjoy historical fiction.
That's great!  I've never been able to get into historical fiction.
It's not for everyone, but I find it really interesting.
I guess I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should!  It's a great way to learn about different cultures.
